a11aabeeceeae6b8cb5d12ea06b56554 (19:30): "If current node is a pre, textarea, or listing element, append a U+000A LINE FEED (LF) character." ‚Äî does anything do that?

b25b6b77a0087ff8385941e5545d32ea (19:33): Doesn't seem worth worrying about unless it causes compat issues

2c39bccd623947fa6224ea57d2a727de (19:34): and then parsed again, doh
